short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically surface knowledge while browsing the web, including any emails, attachments and internal communications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relationship intelligence turns any website into an informational powerhouse.

Dramatically reduce time spent finding information about a company with relationship intelligence, business insights, and a connection to your CRM as you research and engage deals from websites, LinkedIn, and Gmail.
 
The time spent finding information is dramatically reduced while relationships are uncovered, new insights revealed, and your own hidden intelligence is surfaced.
 
With KnowledgeNet.ai, you can:

Find the right deals and save time
See internal relationship data points next to any website.

Gain new insights
Know when target companies were last contacted or mentioned and who was involved, fostering truly fluid communication.
